reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Very nice app, but isn\'t there any option so that even the first ring is also not heard by the caller
reviews.author: aamir hussain

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: One of the only call blocking apps dat work , well satisified!!!
reviews.author: Cherry Pop

reviews.title: good but
reviews.comment: after purchasing pro version adverts are still diplayed the app itself works flawlessly and ill gladly support a good developer however the adds being displayed in the pro version is not fixed as stated by dev
reviews.author: william weldon

reviews.title: Still Great
reviews.comment: When it comes to Optinno Apps. They are always the best!
reviews.author: Young Bridges

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Have had no problem since i have downloaded works grate
reviews.author: Roseanna Dunlap

reviews.title: Annoying but good
reviews.comment: Well, gotta admit that this app is good. But...   Why on the pro, you still have to display SmsBlocker ad?? Even if it\'s your app, it is still an ad  Notification abuse. When i block something, i don\'t need to be notified. Especially being notified to give feedback. That\'s not cool at all
reviews.author: Ishak Yudipratama

reviews.comment: This app good not bad ian using  app my side ok
reviews.author: Dada Khalandar

reviews.title: Missing functionality
reviews.comment: If a contact has many numbers assigned to it, then app should included all the numbers in block list, rather than the default one.  Also allow multiple number selection for blocking at once. If you can\'t think above suggestion is possible  Also block unknown number feature should allow to include important numbers like from banks etc. Or ask after each unknown call_ whether to block for Future or allow in future. And automatically adjust the black and white list.
reviews.author: Aayush Jain

reviews.title: A great tool
reviews.comment: Haven\'t had to deal with those nasty malicious people since. Great peace of mind.
reviews.author: Sonja McDonald

reviews.title: Fab little tool
reviews.comment: After a so called friend tried to ruin my life, she kept calling me up in the night to stick the knife in even further. Thanks to this app, i don\'t even have to know she\'s called unless i check the logs. easy to use and helps me get on with my life.
reviews.author: Angela Jeffery

reviews.title: It works good
reviews.comment: It works superbly. Blocks all unnecessary calls very smartly. Keep up the good work
reviews.author: Pradeep Prasad

reviews.title: Great Application
reviews.comment: I have a pain for an exwife and although I want to see her nasty sms messages ata later time this app allows me to block her sms but later go into the log to view and delete. It also block her nasty phone calls. If you have an annoying ex like I do this app is number one in my book.
reviews.author: David Herman

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Nice app...more great features
reviews.author: Salomo Vino

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: This apps is so much useful.
reviews.author: Son Dang

reviews.title: Optinno is GOOOD, but...
reviews.comment: If there could be a message block too, that\'d be GREAT. But, thank you, you saved me from a big problem caller. :-)
reviews.author: Donna Pace

reviews.title: The Best Call Blocker
reviews.comment: I no longer receive annoying spam calls. I am very pleased with this call blocker and would recommend it to anyone who needs to block annoying calls because it really does the job. You should also try the SMS blocker as thats works like a dream.
reviews.author: Shelley Clayton

reviews.title: Awsome application!!
reviews.comment: The app works fine on my xperia SL :) Small in size, precise in functioning and fully efficient! Just dont try upgrading or adding extra features and all, coz i have seen many apps here which had been superb initially but when the developers try to put in too much, they fail to keep up.
reviews.author: saptarshi bhattacharya

reviews.title: Blocker
reviews.comment: this is a great app. NO more unwanted calls

reviews.title: Pretty decent it seems...
reviews.comment: And its free so why not???

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This app so usefull for me,because it can block the number that i dont recognize.
